issue.title: [Packaging] Update deb names
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3235](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3235). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to update deb package name when we update version because we change lib\*.so version for each version up.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3235?focusedCommentId=16615217) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
